title: If the cost of 30 oranges and 18 apples is Rs 228, what will be the cost of 25 oranges and 15 apples? - Quora
tags: Middle and High School Math Homework Question

response.answer_text: This can be solved using the same approach as the question Mathematics: If the cost of 18 Apple and 45 Mangoes is Rs. 981, then calculate the cost of 10 Apple and 25 Mangoes?
